Author: Aireil
Name: FF Logs Viewer
Description: View FF Logs ranking percentiles in-game. Add a context menu to open someone's logs. Layout, style, stats, default metric, and more are all customizable in the settings.
Punchline: View FF Logs ranking percentiles in-game.
Changelog:
- 2.1.3.0:
   Adds the history feature, containing the last 50 searched characters.
   Most errors are now clickable to bring you on FF Logs.
   Hidden logs are now yellow, to distinguish them from other errors in the party view without hovering.
   Fixes an issue where errors would get cached.
   Combines clear current view and clear cache buttons.
